page.title: 01WRITTLE AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE
page.content: Mr.Owen is the Warden of the College. There are about 350 full time students. Some of the students come from abroad. At the college there are 200 bedrooms,15 classrooms,a hall,gym, bar,common room and 6 science laboratories. Also at the college there are 2 tennis courts. Altogether the college covers 500 acres of land. The college was built in 1938 and there are plans for new buildings. Improvements and additions have been continuously built over the years to provide better facilities for technical training in farming, horticulture,farm mechanisation, agricultural engineering and management. At the college there are excellent libraries for information on farming. So come to Writtle if you want to learn.
